bilingual.source: I play the electric guitar in the school band.
bilingual.target: 我在学校乐队里弹电吉他。

bilingual.source: There were no electric lights, only candles.
Davy was trying to create an electric motor, but he was stuck.
bilingual.target: 戴维试图制造一个电动机，但他遇到了困难。

bilingual.source: Franklin then touched the key with his finger and got an electric shock.
bilingual.target: 富兰克林用手指触摸钥匙，结果被电击了。

bilingual.source: But scientists all agree that if Franklin had actually touched the key, he would certainly have died from the electric shock.
bilingual.target: 但科学家们一致认为，如果富兰克林真的触摸了钥匙，他肯定会因电击而死。
他买了一把新的电吉他。
她买了一个新的电蒸锅。

bilingual.source: I need to buy a new electric fan.
bilingual.target: 我需要买一个新的电风扇。
这个电熨斗加热得很快。

bilingual.source: Can you help me turn on the electric fan?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我打开电风扇吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Her thing is neuro-electric interfacing, telekinesis mental manipulation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女的通过神经电接触，能心灵遥感精神控制。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Electric rotisserie! If god wants a hamburger, this is what she cooks it on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，这是电转烤肉架，如果上帝想吃汉堡，她肯定是用这个来烤肉。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that the electrode? That is the electrode. So basically, there's a big electric current running through that thing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是电极？是的，这就是电极从根本上说现在有电穿过这个东西？

yingyinNormal.en: My pleasure. For a non-physicist, you have a remarkable grasp of how electric dipoles in the brain's water molecules could not possibly form a Bose condensate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很荣幸。作为非物理学家您对大脑水分子中的电偶极子难以形成玻色凝聚物的原因理解得非常到位。

yingyinNormal.en: There is an electric match, together with the shell. When the electric match ignites, the shell is going to propel from the launch tube.
yingyinNormal.zh: 烟花弹配有电子火柴。一旦电子火柴打火，烟花弹就从发射管升空。

yingyinNormal.en: Right now, you're looking at the furnace, the electric arc furnace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在,你看着这个熔炉这个电弧炉。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and I can start to control other peoples' bodies. Also, I can control magnetic and electric waves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以，我也开始可以控制别人的身体，我还可以控制电磁波。

yingyinNormal.en: I just got used to being hot and sweaty all the time. This electric furnace is key to Nucor's innovative strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得很热,一直在流汗。这个电弧炉是钢铁公司主要的创新产品。

yingyinNormal.en: Because last month, I sent the electric company a Starbucks gift card, an apology note, and a few snapshots of me in a bra.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为上个月我给电力公司寄了张星巴克礼品卡，一封道歉信和一些我穿着胸罩的照片。

yingyinNormal.en: Once we paint it, we furnish it, we fix the electric, redo the plumbing, and figure out why that brown spot won't stop growing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只等我们刷上漆，配上家具，修好电路，重新铺好水管，搞清楚那块棕色斑点为何还在变大就行。

yingyinNormal.en: When completed, this integrated electric highway is set to stretch from more than 12,000 miles, half of the earth's circumference.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当这套系统建成，这个高度整合的电力高速网将会绵延近两万公里，相当于绕地球半圈。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bed time. I'm a bit sad that my shadow's gone away. Don't be sad, Peppa. Electric light can make shadows, and we can make shadow puppets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 睡觉的时间到了。我有一点难过因为我的影子不见了。别难过，佩奇。电灯也能让影子出现，我们还能玩手影游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: And she knows as well as I do that electric shock can cause death of tissues which could start a whole inflammatory cascade unless I debride what's been damaged.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她和我都知道，电流致死的组织会引起严重感染，除非我现在切除坏死组织。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, in actuality, what your equipment detected wasn't so much evidence of paradigm shifting monopoles as it was static from the electric can opener we were turning on and off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实，你的仪器侦测的数据不是范式转变单极子的证据，那是电动开罐刀具的静电，我们在不停开关。

yingyinNormal.en: On September 4, 1882, visionary inventor Thomas Edison switched on America's first central power plant, delivering electricity to 400 electric bulbs in less than one square mile of the city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1882年9月4日，发明家托马斯·爱迪生，启动了美国第一个发电站，给400个电灯供电，供电面积不到1平方英里。

yingyinNormal.en: Look. It's simplicity itself. You just turn on the gas, hit the electric starter. Hit the electric starter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看，很简单的，打开气阀，点火，点火。

yingyinNormal.en: Welcome, Skipper, Kowalski and rooting-tooting Rico! The gang's all here. The mood is electric. Is this really, finally everybody?
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎，老大，科沃斯基，还有淘气鬼瑞哥！大伙儿全在这儿，真是太刺激了！这是真的吗，终于齐全了？

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. I'm Leonard. And you are beautiful. You pop, sparkle and buzz electric. I'm going to pick you up at 8:00, show you a night you will never forget.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好啊，我叫莱纳德，你宛若天仙一般，青春，奔放，热力四射，我晚上8点钟去接你，定会带给你一个永生难忘的夜晚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使起电；使带电；使（机器或系统；尤指铁路）电气化；使…兴奋；使激动
n. 电；电力供应；紧张刺激；感情冲动
adj. 电的；电动的；发电的；生产电器的；销售电器的

word_family.mean: adj. 电的；电动的；充电的；能发电的；令人兴奋的；紧张刺激的；电子扩音的；电声的

sense_info_list.en: connected with electricity; using, produced by or producing electricity

examination_example.sentence: Even before the invention of the <highlight>electric</highlight> light bulb, the author produced a remarkable work of speculative fiction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 甚至在电灯泡被发明之前，作者就已经创作了一部出色的推理小说。

examination_example.sentence: Half of the pens would deliver an <highlight>electric</highlight> shock when clicked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 半数的笔一按下就会发出电击。

examination_example.sentence: The advance is driven in part by vehicle manufacturers, who are placing big bets on battery-powered <highlight>electric</highlight> vehicles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一进展一定程度上是由汽车制造商推动的，他们在电池供电的电动汽车上下了大赌注。

word_usage.usage:
electric作形容词时，还可以表示“充满刺激的；令人激动的”，如：
The atmosphere was electric.
气氛很热烈。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使起电；使带电；使（机器或系统；尤指铁路）电气化；使…兴奋；使激动
n. 电；电力供应；紧张刺激；感情冲动
adj. 电的；电动的；发电的；生产电器的；销售电器的

word_family.mean: adj. 电的；电动的；充电的；能发电的；令人兴奋的；紧张刺激的；电子扩音的；电声的

sense_info_list.en: connected with electricity; using, produced by or producing electricity

examination_example.sentence: There are currently around 155, 000 registered hybrid and <highlight>electric</highlight> vehicles on German roads, dwarfed by the 45 million gasoline and diesel cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，德国道路上有大约15.5万辆登记的混合动力和电动汽车，与该国目前的4500万辆汽油和柴油汽车相比，简直是小巫见大巫。

examination_example.sentence: According to the International Business Times, <highlight>electric</highlight> car sales are expected to increase as Volkswagen is still recovering from its emissions scandal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据《国际商业时报》(International Business Times)的报道，由于大众汽车(Volkswagen)仍在从尾气排放的丑闻中恢复元气，因此电动汽车的销售有望增长。

examination_example.sentence: The acceptance of <highlight>electric</highlight> cars in the country has not occurred as fast as expected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国内对电动汽车的接受程度并未达到预期的速度。

sense_info_list.en: used to refer to the supply of electricity to a building

sample.mean: adj. 电磁的

sense_info_list.en: connected with electricity; using; produced by or producing electricity

examination_example.sentence: A growing number of U.S. bike riders are attracted to <highlight>electric</highlight> bikes for convenience, health benefits and their fun factor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的美国自行车骑手被电动自行车所吸引，因为电动自行车方便、有益健康，而且有趣。

examination_example.sentence: Some retailers warned Cocalis that they'd drop the brand if it came out with an <highlight>electric</highlight> bike.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些零售商警告科卡利斯，如果该品牌推出电动自行车，他们将放弃该品牌。

examination_example.sentence: The industry is benefiting from improved batteries as suppliers over the years developed technology for laptops, smartphones and <highlight>electric</highlight> cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为供应商多年来为笔记本电脑、智能手机和电动汽车开发技术，该行业正受益于电池的改进。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 主要用于产生电流或因电产生的事物。
常用于和电有关的工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 电的；电动的；发电的；生产电器的；销售电器的

word_family.mean: adj. 电的；电动的；充电的；能发电的；令人兴奋的；紧张刺激的；电子扩音的；电声的

sense_info_list.en: connected with electricity; using, produced by or producing electricity

examination_example.sentence: He is building a four-wheeled robot that will run on solar and <highlight>electric</highlight> power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他正在制造一个依靠太阳能和电力运行的四轮机器人。

examination_example.sentence: The Intelligent Transport team at Newcastle University have turned an <highlight>electric</highlight> car into a mobile laboratory named "Drive LAB".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽卡斯尔大学的智能交通运输团队把一辆电动车变成了移动实验室，名字就叫“移动实验室”。

sample.mean: adj. 电磁的

examination_example.sentence: An all-<highlight>electric</highlight> car uses no petrol.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全电动汽车不使用汽油。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>electric</highlight> car has to stop more often to get recharged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电动汽车需要更频繁地停车充电。

examination_example.sentence: Compared with gasoline cars, <highlight>electric</highlight> cars are more energy-saving, making them cheaper to operate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与汽油车相比，电动车更节能，运行成本更低。
